meanings.definition: A famous person, typically a young woman, who is famous for being famous.
meanings.sent1: The young celebutante attended the movie premiere with all the cameras flashing.
meanings.sent2: The media couldn't get enough of the famous celebutante's latest fashion choices.
meanings.sent3: The celebutante's fame seemed to grow every time she posted a selfie online.
meanings.sent4: In the world of celebrities, the young starlet was the ultimate celebutante.
meanings.sent5: The glamorous celebutante's life was like a never-ending red carpet event.

meanings.definition: A socialite who has gained celebrity status through their social media presence and lifestyle.
meanings.sent1: The social media influencer quickly rose to fame and became a celebutante in no time.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy celebutante was always seen at the trendiest events in town.
meanings.sent3: Everyone wanted to be friends with the socialite turned celebutante.
meanings.sent4: Her Instagram feed was a window into the luxurious life of a true celebutante.
meanings.sent5: The young woman's transformation into a celebutante was the talk of the town.
